title: Grilled Radicchio and Knob Onion Salad Recipe
full_text:
Grilled Radicchio and Knob Onion Salad Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
15 mins
Cook
25 mins
Total
40 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
medium
head
red leaf lettuce
, torn into pieces, rinsed, and dried
1
head
radicchio
, cut in half and rinsed
6
medium
onions
Olive oil
Kosher salt
Freshly
ground black pepper
For the Vinaigrette:
4
tablespoons
extra virgin olive oil
1
tablespoon
sherry vinegar
2
teaspoons
Dijon mustard
1
medium
shallot
, finely minced
Directions
Whisk together all of the ingredients for the vinaigrette a small bowl and set aside.
Light one chimney full of charcoal.
When all the charcoal is lit and covered with gray ash, pour out and arrange the coals on one side of the charcoal grate for indirect cooking.
Clean
and
oil
the grilling grate. Brush the onions and radicchio all over with olive oil and season with salt and pepper to taste. Place the onions on the hot side of grill and cook until browned, about 2 to 3 minutes per side. Move to the cool side of the grill, cover, and continue cooking until onions are slighty soft, about 10 to 15 minutes more. Remove from the grill and set aside. Place the radicchio on the hot side of the grill, cut side down, and cook until edges are crisp and it just begins to soften, about 2 to 3 minutes. Remove from the grill.
Chop the onions and radicchio medium and toss together in a big bowl with the prepared lettuce. Portion out into bowls or plates, drizzle with the vinaigrette and serve.
Notes
Type of fire:
two-zone indirect
Grill heat:
medium-high
